---
title: "Get Nonce"
description: "Get details about a nonce account"
---

You can request details about nonces in a few different ways:

- All - returns all nonces
- Used - returns nonces already used for a processed/pending transaction
- Active - returns nonces that have not been used yet
- By Id - query by the nonce id
- By Public Key - query by the public key of the nonce account
- By Value - query by the nonce value

<RequestExample>

```bash API
# All Nonces
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/nonce"

# All active nonces (have not been used yet)
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/nonce?status=active"

# All used nonces
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/nonce?status=used"

# By id
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/nonce?id=<nonce_id>"

# By public key of nonce account
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/nonce?public_key=<public_key>"

# By nonce value
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/nonce?value=<nonce_value>"
```

```ts SDK
const allNonces = await nonci.getAllNonces();
const activeNonces = await nonci.getActiveNonces();
const getUsedNonces = await nonci.getUsedNonces();

const nonceById = await nonci.getNonceById("<nonce_id>");
const nonceByPublicKey = await nonci.getNonceByPublicKey("<public_key>");
const nonceByValue = await nonci.getNonceByValue("<nonce_value>");
```

</RequestExample>

<ResponseExample>
